1: <mistake>dam</mistake> mkha' las byung gzugs <mistake>brnan</mistake> <mistake>ni//bsten</mistake> pas bdag la <mistake>de</mistake> bzhin <mistake>no//shes</mistake> rab ma yin thabs kyang <mistake>min//'di</mistake> ni lhan skyes shes rab <mistake>bcas//kun</mistake> nas bde ba rdzogs pa <mistake>las//sgrib</mistake> pa thams
2: cad spangs pa ste // nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa <mistake>med//yul</mistake> dang dbang po spangs pa <mistake>ni//kun</mistake> nas 'byung po kun la gnas // gcad du med pa dbye ba <mistake>spangs//rang</mistake> 'byung rdo rje sems dpa' <mistake>ni //don</mistake> chen
3: mchog tu mi <mistake>'gyur</mistake> <mistake>ba//'dong</mistake> chags chen po sems dpa' <mistake>che// sems</mistake> can <mistake>tzams</mistake> cad dga' bar <mistake>byed//byang</mistake> <mistake>cub</mistake> sems dpa' zhe sdang <mistake>che// nyon</mistake> mongs zad pa dgra <mistake>chan</mistake> po // dam <mistake>tsig</mistake> sems dpa' gti
4: mug <mistake>che//gti</mistake> mug blo ste gti mug <mistake>sel// rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> rnal 'byor khro ba <mistake>che//lha</mistake> min khro bo <mistake>dggra</mistake> chen po // dus kyi 'khor lo <mistake>chgs</mistake> pa <mistake>che//'pho</mistake> ba'i chags pa sel bar <mistake>byed//rdo</mistake> rje mi phyed ces par
5: <mistake>brjod//'di</mistake> ni don chen bcom ldan <mistake>'das//sems</mistake> dpa' srid gsum gcig pa <mistake>nyid//mchog</mistake> tu mi 'gyur brjod par <mistake>bya//mchog</mistake> tu mi 'gyur bde <mistake>bardzogs//sa</mistake> rnams yongs su rdzogs
6: <mistake>/ pa</mistake> <mistake>yis //'dod</mistake> chags <mistake>tcshan</mistake> po sems <mistake>dpa'che//sems</mistake> can thams cad dga' bar <mistake>byed//byang</mistake> chub la gnas sems dpa' <mistake>ni //mi</mistake> g.yo de phyir byang chub <mistake>sims//nyon</mistake> mongs la sogs
7: zhe sdang <mistake>tshogs//zhe</mistake> sdang chen po dgra che <mistake>ba/ / dma</mistake> tshig zla ba bdud rtsi <mistake>yi //khu</mistake> ba 'pho med de za <mistake>ba//dam</mistake> tshig sems dpa'o rigs pa <mistake>'dis//gti</mistake> mug blo ste gti mug <mistake>sel //rdo</mistake> rje thams
8: cad gcig <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>nyid//shes</mistake> <mistake>dab</mistake> <mistake>sku</mistake> dang mi 'gyur <mistake>bcas//khro</mistake> bo chen po dgra chen <mistake>po/khro</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> gzugs can bdud rnams <mistake>kyi'o // 'gyur</mistake> med bde ba che thabs <mistake>las//nam</mistake> yang sems can don
